column4: does anyone have intel intergrated graphics and have problems watching youtube videos in general and have video lag with any sort of normal process?
i don't have any problems with that
strange
did you have to do anything when you first installed?
no
laptop or desktop?
eeepc netbook
hmmm, do you think it could be that i have a celeron processor or only 1gb of ram?
which is a pineview n450 atom
no
well if you did have some video lag, what would you try doing to fix it? i tried installing the drivers but they are already installed and i've reinstalled and rebooted 30 times
what kind of celeron is that? is it a newer model or very old?
i'm not sure exactly how old it is, but it's one of those silver and blue dell inspiron 1100's. i just got it for $40 from someone of craigslist. the display was great on xp but i need ubuntu :)
have you got flash plugin installed?
doesn't it come preinstalled with chrome?
if not, then that flash replacement is probably the problem
no
install flash plugin
then it should work smoothly
but either way, even this irc is laggy and opening up a window. its obvious video lag at all times
yeah :/ my old laptop had no problem with ubuntu
Your Google Chrome browser already includes Adobe® Flash® Player built-in. Google Chrome will automatically update when new versions of Flash Player are available.
which resolution do you have? 1024*768?
yes, it won't let me change anything
